Quote.Author: Harvey Fierstein
Quote.QuoteValue: In London they don't like you if you're still alive

Quote.Author: Harvey Mackay
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, job titles don't matter. Everyone is in sales. It's the only way we stay in business

Quote.Author: Harvey Mackay
Quote.QuoteValue: Ethical decisions ensure that everyone's best interests are protected. When in doubt, don't

Quote.Author: Harvey Mackay
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent is God-given; be humble. Fame is man-given; be thankful. Conceit is self-given; be careful

Quote.Author: Harvey Mackay
Quote.QuoteValue: My Golden Rule of Networking is simple: Don't keep score

Quote.Author: Harvey Mackay
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that visualization is one of the most powerful means of achieving personal goals

Quote.Author: Harvey Mackay
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have integrity, nothing else matters. If you don't have integrity, nothing else matters

Quote.Author: Harvey Mackay
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't buy a good reputation; you must earn it

Quote.Author: Harvey Mackay
Quote.QuoteValue: Amateurs wait for inspiration. The real pros get up and go to work

Quote.Author: Harvey Mackay
Quote.QuoteValue: Exploring how you could make a bad situation worse can sometimes tell you what not to do

Quote.Author: Harvey Mackay
Quote.QuoteValue: Pale ink is better than the most retentive memory

Quote.Author: Harvey Pekar
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody's like everybody else, and everybody's different from everybody else

Quote.Author: Harvey Pekar
Quote.QuoteValue: There hasn't been enough change in comics to suit me. I don't know why exactly

Quote.Author: Harvey Pekar
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you can do anything with comics that you could do in just about any art form

Quote.Author: Harvey Pekar
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mind if I show myself being cheap or unreasonable sometimes

Quote.Author: Harvey Pekar
Quote.QuoteValue: Misery loves company. There's a lot to that

Quote.Author: Harvey Pekar
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you can find all the elements that you can find in great literature in mundane experiences

Quote.Author: Harvey Pekar
Quote.QuoteValue: I came up with American Splendor. Some people think it's American Squalor

Quote.Author: Harvey Pekar
Quote.QuoteValue: It makes you feel good to know that there's other people afflicted like you

Quote.Author: Harvey Pekar
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to get every man involved in art, into experimental music, or painting, or novel-writing

Quote.Author: Harvey Pekar
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always shook up and nervous and I've got the hospital record to prove it

Quote.Author: Harvey Weinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to do something inspirational for my children

Quote.Author: Harvey Weinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a benevolent dictator

Quote.Author: Harvey Weinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people handle sweets better

Quote.Author: Harvey Weinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope to continue my friendship with France and its filmmakers for many years to come

Quote.Author: Harvey Weinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: First of all, I never make a movie for awards consideration

Quote.Author: Harvey Weinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I always find that when I do something that I like, from my heart, then it works

Quote.Author: Harvey Weinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I think sometimes we in the industry have to do ambitious projects

Quote.Author: Harvey Weinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the father of four daughters

Quote.Author: Harvey Weinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: To have the National Rifle Association rule the United States of America is pathetic

Quote.Author: Harvey Weinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: We in the independent sector more than anybody need Netflix, because they care about what we do

Quote.Author: Hassan Nasrallah
Quote.QuoteValue: Peace cannot be unilateral

Quote.Author: Hassan Nasrallah
Quote.QuoteValue: The fall of the Syrian regime is in the interest of America and Israel

Quote.Author: Hassan Nasrallah
Quote.QuoteValue: So long as there is imperialism in the world, a permanent peace is impossible

Quote.Author: Hassan Nasrallah
Quote.QuoteValue: Force is the duty of the state, not Hizbullah

Quote.Author: Hassan Nasrallah
Quote.QuoteValue: However, there is no legal and legitimate state called Israel

Quote.Author: Hassan Nasrallah
Quote.QuoteValue: I am against any reconciliation with Israel

Quote.Author: Hassan Nasrallah
Quote.QuoteValue: It is unacceptable, it is forbidden, to harm the innocent

Quote.Author: Hassan Nasrallah
Quote.QuoteValue: Any Israeli attack on Lebanon, Iran, Syria or Gaza will be met with a fierce response

Quote.Author: Hassan Nasrallah
Quote.QuoteValue: Israel lost their power to intimidate during the second war with Lebanon

Quote.Author: Hassan Nasrallah
Quote.QuoteValue: The U.N. Security Council did not to condemn the Qana massacre, due to the U.S. veto

Quote.Author: Hattie McDaniel
Quote.QuoteValue: I always have the best of everything

Quote.Author: Hattie McDaniel
Quote.QuoteValue: I did my best, and God did the rest

Quote.Author: Hattie McDaniel
Quote.QuoteValue: I am loathe to get married again. I've been married enough; I just prefer to forget it

Quote.Author: Hattie McDaniel
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman's gifts will make room for her

Quote.Author: Hattie McDaniel
Quote.QuoteValue: As for those grapefruit and buttermilk diets, I'll take roast chicken and dumplings

Quote.Author: Hattie McDaniel
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith is the black person's federal reserve system

Quote.Author: Hattie McDaniel
Quote.QuoteValue: We all respect sincerity in our friends and acquaintances, but Hollywood is willing to pay for it

Quote.Author: Hattie McDaniel
Quote.QuoteValue: You can best fight any existing evil from the inside

Quote.Author: Hattie McDaniel
Quote.QuoteValue: Bob Hope, Red Skelton, and Eddie Cantor... help us keep our balance

Quote.Author: Hattie McDaniel
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't belong on this earth. I always feel out of place - like a visitor

Quote.Author: Havelock Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man of genius sees the world at a different angle from his fellows, and there is his tragedy

Quote.Author: Havelock Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: All the art of living lies in a fine mingling of letting go and holding on

Quote.Author: Havelock Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: All civilization has from time to time become a thin crust over a volcano of revolution

Quote.Author: Havelock Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: The Promised Land always lies on the other side of a Wilderness

Quote.Author: Havelock Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: Jealousy, that dragon which slays love under the pretence of keeping it alive

Quote.Author: Havelock Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: Every artist writes his own autobiography

Quote.Author: Havelock Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: What we call progress is the exchange of one nuisance for another nuisance

Quote.Author: Havelock Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing that war has ever achieved that we could not better achieve without it

Quote.Author: Havelock Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: The place where optimism most flourishes is the lunatic asylum

Quote.Author: Havelock Ellis
Quote.QuoteValue: What we call 'morals' is simply blind obedience to words of command

Quote.Author: Hayao Miyazaki
Quote.QuoteValue: I get inspiration from my everyday life

Quote.Author: Hayao Miyazaki
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in an age when it is cheaper to buy the rights to movies than to make them

Quote.Author: Hayao Miyazaki
Quote.QuoteValue: Currently computer graphics are used a great deal, but it can be excessive

Quote.Author: Hayao Miyazaki
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a collector

Quote.Author: Hayao Miyazaki
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like more of the world go back to being wild

Quote.Author: Hayao Miyazaki
Quote.QuoteValue: People in Japan have experienced many tsunamis and various earthquakes throughout the ages

Quote.Author: Hayao Miyazaki
Quote.QuoteValue: We get strength and encouragement from watching children

Quote.Author: Hayao Miyazaki
Quote.QuoteValue: All my films are all my children

Quote.Author: Hayao Miyazaki
Quote.QuoteValue: Humans have both the urge to create and destroy

Quote.Author: Hayao Miyazaki
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we should stop using nuclear power plants because it's an old system that we can't control

Quote.Author: Heath Ledger
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in control of my life, not anyone in Hollywood

Quote.Author: Heath Ledger
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm kind of addicted to moving

Quote.Author: Heath Ledger
Quote.QuoteValue: I only do this because I'm having fun. The day I stop having fun, I'll just walk away

Quote.Author: Heath Ledger
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing like working with your mates - it's the way it should be, as far as I'm concerned

Quote.Author: Heath Ledger
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are just safe about the choices you make, you don't grow

Quote.Author: Heath Ledger
Quote.QuoteValue: I apologize for my terrible interview skills

Quote.Author: Heath Ledger
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're just safe about the choices you make, you don't grow

Quote.Author: Heath Ledger
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I'm wasting time if I repeat myself

Quote.Author: Heath Ledger
Quote.QuoteValue: You learn more about yourself through your child, I guess

Quote.Author: Heath Ledger
Quote.QuoteValue: In order not to hold a frame with someone, you have to be intimidated by them

Quote.Author: Heather Brooke
Quote.QuoteValue: Politicians often claim secrecy is necessary for good governance or national security

Quote.Author: Heather Brooke
Quote.QuoteValue: I know people don't like America very much, but the one thing it's very good on is local government

Quote.Author: Heather Brooke
Quote.QuoteValue: It is scrutiny by the general public that keeps the powerful honest

Quote.Author: Heather Brooke
Quote.QuoteValue: We are not naughty children, and the state is not our parent

Quote.Author: Heather Brooke
Quote.QuoteValue: Our printing press is the Internet. Our coffee houses are social networks

Quote.Author: Heather Brooke
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a freedom of information campaigner, so obviously I support the cause of Wikileaks

Quote.Author: Heather Brooke
Quote.QuoteValue: In the soil of ignorance, fear can easily be sown

Quote.Author: Heather Brooke
Quote.QuoteValue: Hackers often describe what they do as playfully creative problem solving

Quote.Author: Heather Brooke
Quote.QuoteValue: The royal family are protected from public accountability by law

Quote.Author: Heather Brooke
Quote.QuoteValue: The monarchy is a part of the state. It exists to serve the people

Quote.Author: Heather Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever I meet people who seem really sweet and unassuming, I kind of wonder about them

Quote.Author: Heather Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: There's not a lot of stories for women told by women in a very real, true voice

Quote.Author: Heather Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to get 11 or 12 hours of sleep a night. It sounds excessive but that's really what I need

Quote.Author: Heather Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: As a kid, I read 'Peter Pan,' and I really wanted to be him

Quote.Author: Heather Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd have made a terrible nun

Quote.Author: Heather Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I admire those people who hold on to their elegance in old age but I'd rather have fun

Quote.Author: Heather Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a good Catholic girl in the way that Madonna is. In the sense that I'm not that good at all

Quote.Author: Heather Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I practice transcendental meditation and there is a phase where you're meant to lift off the ground

Quote.Author: Heather Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: There are less opportunities for women

Quote.Author: Heather Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it might be nice to date someone not in the business

Quote.Author: Heather Mills
Quote.QuoteValue: If you wear short skirts you get your femininity back

Quote.Author: Heather Mills
Quote.QuoteValue: I fell in love for the right reason. I fell in love unconditionally

Quote.Author: Heather Mills
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to dance in the disco, but that's about it

Quote.Author: Heather Mills
Quote.QuoteValue: I was quiet for a year but I had 4,000 articles written about me

Quote.Author: Heather Mills
Quote.QuoteValue: It took one human error to take my leg and one human error to take my mother's

Quote.Author: Heather Mills
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't leave England

Quote.Author: Heather Mills
Quote.QuoteValue: There are many other kinds of milk available. Why don't we try drinking rats' milk and dogs' milk?

Quote.Author: Heather Mills
Quote.QuoteValue: To have an opinion about somebody you've never met before is pretty superficial

Quote.Author: Heather Mills
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a charity campaigner

Quote.Author: Heather Mills
Quote.QuoteValue: Eighty per cent of global warming comes from livestock and deforestation

Quote.Author: Heber J. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no such thing as standing still

Quote.Author: Heber J. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I value all things as nothing in comparison with having the spirit of God to guide me

Quote.Author: Heber J. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: The power of the living God is here on the earth. The Priesthood is here

Quote.Author: Heber J. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Day-dreams without work do not amount to anything; it is the actual work that counts

Quote.Author: Heber J. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no animosity against any living soul

Quote.Author: Heber J. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Being an only child, my mother reared me very carefully

Quote.Author: Heber J. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: There never was one particle of... jealousy... in the heart of Hyrum Smith

Quote.Author: Heber J. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Prosperity comes to those who observe the law of tithing

Quote.Author: Heber J. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: When I first began to learn to sing, it took me from three to four months to learn two simple hymns

Quote.Author: Heber J. Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I have, all the days of my life, enjoyed singing very much

Quote.Author: Hector Elizondo
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, and it's my third movie with Richard. American Gigolo was my first

Quote.Author: Hector Elizondo
Quote.QuoteValue: Which reminds me of a fortune cookie: you often find your destiny on the path you take to avoid it

Quote.Author: Hector Elizondo
Quote.QuoteValue: Pretty Woman was the easiest job I've ever done. I just wore the right toupee

Quote.Author: Hector Elizondo
Quote.QuoteValue: On those, I've said it before, I work free. It's the waiting they pay me for

Quote.Author: Hector Elizondo
Quote.QuoteValue: Food is a passion. Food is love

Quote.Author: Hector Elizondo
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm attracted to pathos, because life is mostly pathos. I've had a lot of it in my life

Quote.Author: Hector Elizondo
Quote.QuoteValue: You're at the top of your game if you do comedy

Quote.Author: Hector Elizondo
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I just walk through; I just show up, as in The Other Sister

Quote.Author: Hector Elizondo
Quote.QuoteValue: I've dodged bullets but there's no scandal in my life

Quote.Author: Hector Elizondo
Quote.QuoteValue: I work with Garry no matter what. What I wanted to keep going was the streak

Quote.Author: Hedy Lamarr
Quote.QuoteValue: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid

Quote.Author: Hedy Lamarr
Quote.QuoteValue: A good painting to me has always been like a friend. It keeps me company, comforts and inspires

Quote.Author: Hedy Lamarr
Quote.QuoteValue: All creative people want to do the unexpected

Quote.Author: Hedy Lamarr
Quote.QuoteValue: I can excuse everything but boredom. Boring people don't have to stay that way

Quote.Author: Hedy Lamarr
Quote.QuoteValue: Because you don't live near a bakery doesn't mean you have to go without cheesecake

Quote.Author: Hedy Lamarr
Quote.QuoteValue: Compromise and tolerance are magic words. It took me 40 years to become philosophical

Quote.Author: Hedy Lamarr
Quote.QuoteValue: All my six husbands married me for different reasons

Quote.Author: Hedy Lamarr
Quote.QuoteValue: I was in constant demand, in my professional life and my personal life

Quote.Author: Hedy Lamarr
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a sworn enemy of convention. I despise the conventional in anything, even the arts

Quote.Author: Hedy Lamarr
Quote.QuoteValue: The public pays and feels it is entitled to participate in the personal affairs of a performer

Quote.Author: Heidi Klum
Quote.QuoteValue: Never underestimate the power of the ocean

Quote.Author: Heidi Klum
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, my business is my business and my house is my house. I don't want the public in my house

Quote.Author: Heidi Klum
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a Victoria's Secret model, which was always my dream

Quote.Author: Heidi Klum
Quote.QuoteValue: I actually eat a lot

Quote.Author: Heidi Klum
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I was going to school in Germany. And in my free time I was dancing

Quote.Author: Heidi Klum
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman is a woman!

Quote.Author: Heidi Klum
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have the hard everyday life that so many working mothers face

Quote.Author: Heidi Klum
Quote.QuoteValue: I sing a lot, even with my voice

Quote.Author: Heidi Klum
Quote.QuoteValue: I come from a place where we're not that shy about our bodies

Quote.Author: Heidi Klum
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a whole army of pajamas

Quote.Author: Heinrich Heine
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course God will forgive me; that's His job

Quote.Author: Heinrich Heine
Quote.QuoteValue: Wherever they burn books they will also, in the end, burn human beings

Quote.Author: Heinrich Heine
Quote.QuoteValue: Human misery is too great for men to do without faith

Quote.Author: Heinrich Heine
Quote.QuoteValue: Experience is a good school. But the fees are high

Quote.Author: Heinrich Heine
Quote.QuoteValue: True eloquence consists in saying all that is necessary, and nothing but what is necessary

Quote.Author: Heinrich Heine
Quote.QuoteValue: When words leave off, music begins

Quote.Author: Heinrich Heine
Quote.QuoteValue: The Wedding March always reminds me of the music played when soldiers go into battle

Quote.Author: Heinrich Heine
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot feed the hungry on statistics

Quote.Author: Heinrich Heine
Quote.QuoteValue: God will forgive me. It's his job

Quote.Author: Heinrich Heine
Quote.QuoteValue: There are more fools in the world than there are people

Quote.Author: Helen Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: People kill for love. They die for love

Quote.Author: Helen Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Good-looking people are always looking for other good-looking people

Quote.Author: Helen Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the happiness we find, we make

Quote.Author: Helen Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time you cuddle with your children, you're likely to be driving down your testosterone

Quote.Author: Helen Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Experiences shape the brain, but the brain shapes the way we view experiences, too

Quote.Author: Helen Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: We are wired to find love

Quote.Author: Helen Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Romantic love is an addiction

Quote.Author: Helen Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody gets out of love alive. You turn into a menace or a pest when you've been rejected

Quote.Author: Helen Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: There is more and more data indicating that there is a biological basis to your political views

Quote.Author: Helen Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: People have been looking for love potions since hunter-gatherer societies

Quote.Author: Helen Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Age is not important unless you're a cheese

Quote.Author: Helen Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: If you rest, you rust

Quote.Author: Helen Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Legends die hard. They survive as truth rarely does

Quote.Author: Helen Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: The hardest years in life are those between ten and seventy

Quote.Author: Helen Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Childhood is a short season

Quote.Author: Helen Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: One has to grow up with good talk in order to form the habit of it

Quote.Author: Helen Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I cry out for order and find it only in art

Quote.Author: Helen Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: We relish news of our heroes, forgetting that we are extraordinary to somebody too

Quote.Author: Helen Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: When traveling with someone, take large does of patience and tolerance with your morning coffee

Quote.Author: Helen Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Stardom can be a gilded slavery

Quote.Author: Helen McCrory
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're constantly frightened of being unhappy, how bloody exhausting must that be?

Quote.Author: Helen McCrory
Quote.QuoteValue: I listen to Radio 4 all the time. I didn't go to university, so that's my further education

Quote.Author: Helen McCrory
Quote.QuoteValue: To be honest, my husband and my children are my best friends

Quote.Author: Helen McCrory
Quote.QuoteValue: As I've got older, I feel more confident in my body, so wouldn't want to tamper with it

Quote.Author: Helen McCrory
Quote.QuoteValue: I think change is good because it teaches you that it's nothing to be frightened of

Quote.Author: Helen McCrory
Quote.QuoteValue: I've become more confident as I have got older. I care less what others think

Quote.Author: Helen McCrory
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to say that theatre was my favourite thing. But the more I do film, the more I appreciate it

Quote.Author: Helen McCrory
Quote.QuoteValue: What I find most interesting about acting is transforming myself

Quote.Author: Helen McCrory
Quote.QuoteValue: Working in films, there are hundreds of odd moments

Quote.Author: Helen McCrory
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a real art freak when I was a teenager

Quote.Author: Helen Reddy
Quote.QuoteValue: If I have to, I can do anything. I am strong, I am invincible, I am Woman

Quote.Author: Helen Reddy
Quote.QuoteValue: I did my own music videos, my own TV commercials

Quote.Author: Helen Reddy
Quote.QuoteValue: I like music to soothe me

Quote.Author: Helen Reddy
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of women are turned off by the physical appearance of some of the first feminists

Quote.Author: Helen Reddy
Quote.QuoteValue: You're not going to find a man whose socks don't get dirty or who doesn't snore

Quote.Author: Helen Reddy
Quote.QuoteValue: I am woman, hear me roar

Quote.Author: Helen Reddy
Quote.QuoteValue: I am woman, hear me roar, in numbers too big to ignore, and I know too much to go back and pretend

Quote.Author: Helen Reddy
Quote.QuoteValue: Hindsight is wonderful. It's always very easy to second guess after the fact

Quote.Author: Helen Reddy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very private person, and when I leave the stage, I leave the stage

Quote.Author: Helen Reddy
Quote.QuoteValue: I always believed that I could make it or I would never have spent so many years trying to get here

Quote.Author: Helen Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're in the news business, you always expect the unexpected

Quote.Author: Helen Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'll work all my life. When you're having fun, why stop having fun?

Quote.Author: Helen Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't spread democracy with a barrel of a gun

Quote.Author: Helen Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think there are any rude questions

Quote.Author: Helen Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think a tough question is disrespectful

Quote.Author: Helen Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: But when will our leaders learn - war is not the answer

Quote.Author: Helen Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: War makes strange bedfellows

Quote.Author: Helen Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: The day Dick Cheney is going to run for president, I'll kill myself. All we need is one more liar

Quote.Author: Helen Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm covering the worst president in American history

Quote.Author: Helen Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: Every President hates the Press

Quote.Author: Helena Bonham Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I think my mouth just opens and I spontaneously say things that occur to me

Quote.Author: Helena Bonham Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got Tourette's, practically. I'll tell anyone anything

Quote.Author: Helena Bonham Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: All the ancient classic fairy tales have always been scary and dark

Quote.Author: Helena Bonham Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no normality in life

Quote.Author: Helena Bonham Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I liked pretending to be other people: I could reinvent myself, reinvent my own reality

Quote.Author: Helena Bonham Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: A film actor is just a victim of directors and editors

Quote.Author: Helena Bonham Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: Fairytales have always got to have that scary quality, as long as you make them laugh

Quote.Author: Helena Bonham Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I think smells, like sounds, can be so much immediately affecting

Quote.Author: Helena Bonham Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I would pretend to be the French lieutenant's woman. I was always a romantic. I still am, actually

Quote.Author: Helena Bonham Carter
Quote.QuoteValue: I love witches and magic and dress-up and make-believe

Quote.Author: Helmut Jahn
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, drawing generates thinking and vice versa

Quote.Author: Helmut Jahn
Quote.QuoteValue: Higher ceilings allow the use indirect lighting, which is much healthier and reduces glare

Quote.Author: Helmut Jahn
Quote.QuoteValue: I find if my body feels well and I exercise regularly, I think better, work better and feel better

Quote.Author: Helmut Jahn
Quote.QuoteValue: IBM has a very solid business image

Quote.Author: Helmut Jahn
Quote.QuoteValue: A city building, you experience when you walk; a suburban building, you experience when you drive

Quote.Author: Helmut Jahn
Quote.QuoteValue: Creativity has more to do with the elimination of the inessential than with inventing something new

Quote.Author: Helmut Jahn
Quote.QuoteValue: Every building is a prototype. No two are alike

Quote.Author: Helmut Jahn
Quote.QuoteValue: When I think of some of my earlier work, it really seems a fortunate coincidence that I succeeded

Quote.Author: Helmut Jahn
Quote.QuoteValue: I strive for an architecture from which nothing can be taken away

Quote.Author: Helmut Jahn
Quote.QuoteValue: We are creating a unique experience. It's starts with how you see the building from a distance

Quote.Author: Helmut Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're young, you're fearless and more creative, more of an outsider

Quote.Author: Helmut Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I'm the one that invented glamour at all

Quote.Author: Helmut Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been interested in the event when I'm the center of attention

Quote.Author: Helmut Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the history and the past we have is just an energy we've built up to do what we do now

Quote.Author: Helmut Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been asked to collaborate with fashion houses using my artwork, which I will probably do

Quote.Author: Helmut Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always been interested in materials and in transforming them

Quote.Author: Helmut Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a lot of insecurities, but you learn from your failures

Quote.Author: Helmut Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: Once I'm committed, I'm unafraid of the outcome

Quote.Author: Helmut Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really bad at describing my own life

Quote.Author: Helmut Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: I was never so directly inspired by fashion. It always came from somewhere else

Quote.Author: Henny Youngman
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're going to do something tonight that you'll be sorry for tomorrow morning, sleep late

Quote.Author: Henny Youngman
Quote.QuoteValue: If at first you don't succeed... so much for skydiving

Quote.Author: Henny Youngman
Quote.QuoteValue: When God sneezed, I didn't know what to say

Quote.Author: Henny Youngman
Quote.QuoteValue: I told the doctor I broke my leg in two places. He told me to quit going to those places

Quote.Author: Henny Youngman
Quote.QuoteValue: The horse I bet on was so slow, the jockey kept a diary of the trip

Quote.Author: Henny Youngman
Quote.QuoteValue: When I read about the evils of drinking, I gave up reading

Quote.Author: Henny Youngman
Quote.QuoteValue: Just got back from a pleasure trip: I took my mother-in-law to the airport

Quote.Author: Henny Youngman
Quote.QuoteValue: If my mother knew I did this for a living, she'd kill me. She thinks I'm selling dope

Quote.Author: Henny Youngman
Quote.QuoteValue: This man is frank and earnest with women. In Fresno, he's Frank and in Chicago he's Ernest
